chapters.title: Chapter 13:  Wonderful News
chapters.info: Bera Harkin, p. 308 (349)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She has three Warders. She was sent, along with Kiruna, to establish diplomatic relations with Rand in the Aiel Waste. She grew up in Andor. After following Rand to Dumai's Wells, she was made to swear fealty to him. Min says that Rand should be able to trust her.
